attributes.action: Postpone all universal credit advance loan repayments
attributes.additional_details: People are struggling to feed, clothe and cover all bills especially now all the children are off school ... all loan repayments should continue when the world gets back to normal in 6 to 12 months
attributes.background: Postpone all universal credit advance loan repayments to help to the vulnerable survive during the corona crisis as people need as much money to feed there family’s etc
